titles: The soules conflict with it selfe, and victory over it self by faith a treatise of the inward disquietments of distressed spirits, with comfortable remedies to establish them / by R. Sibbs ...
author: Sibbes, Richard, 1577-1635.
publisher: Printed by M.F. for R. Dawlman at the Brazen serpent in Pauls-churchyard,
